backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, artist data, media items, donations, and Stripe configuration using AccessControl, storage mixins, and various query/update calls.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing their roles in styling, routing, components, hooks, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root mount element and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up React Router routes, global layout, theme provider, and toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/artist/ArtistOnb: Dialog form for creating or editing artist profiles with avatar upload and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/donations/Donate: Donation modal allowing preset/custom amounts and Stripe checkout session creation.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout wrapper providing header, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer showing copyright and Caffeine.ai attribution with dynamic year.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive site header with navigation links and login button, adjusting displayed items based on authentication.
Displays a media item card with thumbnail or playback, artist info, tags, and optional donation button.
Responsive grid layout wrapper for displaying media cards.
frontend/src/components/media/MediaPlayb: Renders video or audio playback UI based on media category, with fallback for missing files.
frontend/src/components/media/MediaUploa: Handles selecting, editing, and uploading multiple media files with progress tracking and metadata inputs.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchBar: Simple search input with icon and change handler.
frontend/src/components/stripe/StripeCon: Manages Stripe connection state, allowing artists to connect or disconnect their Stripe account.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status helpers. Wraps AuthClient with custom options and exposes identity state to the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user, artist, and media data through the actor API. Supports profile updates, artist onboarding, media retrieval, and related state management.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables, light/dark palettes, and global styling rules. Includes base layer resets and custom utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app by mounting QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider around the root App component. Loads global CSS and creates the root render target.
frontend/src/pages/artist/ArtistPage.tsx: Shows an artist’s profile, external links, donation status, and uploaded media with loading and missing-artist handling. Fetches artist details and related media by artist ID.
frontend/src/pages/browse/CategoryBrowse: Lists media filtered by category and search query with category-specific metadata and icons. Handles loading, error, and empty states using enriched media data.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/ArtistDashb: Artist dashboard wrapper handling auth, profile loading, onboarding, and tab navigation for home, media, and donations.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/DashboardDo: Displays donation stats, recent donations placeholder, and per‑item donation breakdown based on the artist’s media.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/DashboardHo: Shows artist profile info, edit dialog, stats, external links, and media count with quick-access actions.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/DashboardMe: Media management page allowing uploads, listing items, and deleting media with category labels and icons.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Displays the landing page with hero content, category cards, and a preview of recent media. Fetches enriched media and adapts UI based on authentication state.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentFailu: Displays a cancelled payment message with navigation options after a failed donation attempt.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentSucce: Shows a success message for completed donations and invalidates related queries, offering navigation links.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for getting, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s overall state, including schema versions, platform summary, architectural notes, and a list of implemented features with associated requirements.
